long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for a specific local application, it shows an alert message to the user when he makes certain choices in the application (it is a kind of confirmation of his choice) before submitting some forms.
This extension don't save any information and don't modify any data, it just show an alert message
